name: Thought Ruler Archfiend
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK in the GY. When a Spell/Trap Card is activated that targets 1 Psychic monster (and no other cards) (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
